1.content: He decides to investigate the noise. Edging close to it source, he finds a woman being attacked by a wild coyote! He's not exactly the bravest man, but he can't just leave her there!!
1.title: What in the hell is that?

choices: take her number, and return making way to your original destination
12.content: He approaches the dog, making loud noise and tries to scare it away. The woman is flailing on the ground trying to fight off the dog, but having no success. With luck, the man kicks the dog in the jaw and it scurries away. The woman is very grateful and offers the man to go for coffee.
12.title: Fight the Dog

choices: Wait until the GPs comes back
Forge through and make his own path!
122.content: He takes her number, jotting it down within his iPhone to text her later. The woman gives him a wink and a little come hither wag of her fingertips. He finds that his phone has no connection and he doesn't know where to go for his current destination!
122.title: take her number, and return making way to your ...

choices: Ignore the text and continue GPS coordinates leading to original destination
1221.content:
Waving salutations, his silhouette fades from her view.

Realizing he was now lost, it occurred to him that he could have asked her for help, but seeing as how she now perceived him as a hero, he didn't want to seem pathetic.

His hand outstretches toward the moonlit sky, phone in hand, fervently eyeing the the service indicator.

A single bar of connection appears!

"Success!"

As his thumb taps the screen to open his map application, he receives a text message from his best friend, inviting him to a party!
1221.title: Wait until the GPs comes back

info.description:
A man is walking down a dark trail through a forest. The light of the Full Moon is the only thing lighting his way, although he could get to his destination blindfolded if he wanted to.

After about 15 minutes of walking, he arrives at a fork in the road. He is supposed to go left, but he hears a noise coming from the right. He's not limited on time, he could investigate if he wanted to....
